author: blair
msg: Remove the sample line in post-commit showing the 'log-commit.py'
command.  This script does not exist in the Subversion source
tree and if you Google for 'log-commit.py' you'll see a few
people wondering where this script is.

author: blair
msg: Deprecate commit-email.pl and recommend mailer.py.  See
Add a comment at the top indicating this script is deprecated.
Use the new URL for commit-email.pl.in.
Replace commit-email.pl sample commands with mailer.py commands.
Generate commit-email.pl in its new location.

author: djames
msg: On the ctypes-python-bindings branch: Update ctypes bindings to consistently
use paths in the internal style, therefore fixing bugs on Windows.
(WC.__init__): Convert input path from local style to internal style.
(WC._build_path): Convert paths to local style and back so that os.path.join
* test/wc.py: Update all tests to use internal style for paths, and to assume
that all tests work on Windows.
